categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Derdmin was an IPV-1 System Patrol Craft used by the Rebel Alliance to patrol XQ3 Platform AZ 77.

At some point in the Galactic Civil War, Imperial forces from the Nebulon B frigate, Implacable, attacked the platform to lure the MC40a light cruiser, Ardent, into an ambush. The patrol craft was destroyed, along with the platform and its defenses of Z-95 Headhunters.
